cause.description:
Our main mission is to stop Fucking ugly or fugly people from ever reproducing and therefore populating the world with good looking girls and boys. . .So the next time someone takes home a partner no matter how much beer has been drunk they'll know they will be waking up next to sexy partners. . . . .OR ATLEAST SOMETHING CLOSE! ! !
1. NO UGLY BABIES!!
2. NO UGLY PEOPLE
3. NO BEER GOGGELS REQUIRED
cause.name: Fugly should never do the nasty
